thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com
thread.title: Steve Macfarlane

author: Steve Macfarlane
title: Steve Macfarlane
text:
We were arranging our wedding and (per usual) left things late, particularly invitations - which is when I found Greenvelope!
Within 48 hours I had all (150) day time invitations issued, swiftly followed by many more (400) for evening.
Very easy to use app, setting up e-invites was straightforward.
Uploading of contacts is also easy to do but recommend you do this using their template.
I also made a few errors but these were simple to correct online.
Tracking invites, issuing a reminder, sending links to charity of our choice (no gifts) - all of this was available inside the app.
I will use this whenever I am setting up parties or events and have also recommended the application now to our friends who run several large hotels - as it may assist them when organizing major events in future.
